title: Drawing, "Elevation of a Wall Monument", 1780
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on white laid paper
markings: Verso: Cooper Union Museum, New York, Stamp 457e
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Monument takes general scheme of a pedestal. Top section decorated with medallion of  sun, festoons below. Bottom section shows cross-shaped tablet at center, decorated pilasters topped with rosettes at either side. Base decorated with acanthus leaves. Shadows throughout.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Elevation of a Wall Monument", 1780.
1780. Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1911-28-303.
